fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Careful Watch (3-shot): Target a player. You will see who they visit and who visits them.
~ Discovery (1-shot): Target a player. You will learn their role subtype (Support, Protective, etc.)
~ Preventative Measures (2-shot): Target a player. If any role attempts to convert them, or if the target attempts to convert anyone, you will roleblock and attack the converter with a Powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ If the Coven, Unseen, Vampires or Cult spawn, this role has increased priority to spawn.
~ You will know if the Coven, Unseen, Vampires or Cult are present in the game
~ You are conversion immune.
